alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 6:17PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms with gusty winds will impact portions of Coconino County near Tuba City and Highway 89 through 700 PM MST... At 616 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of Tuba City to near Coalmine Canyon Chapter House. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tuba City, The Gap, Coalmine Canyon Chapter House, Moenave, Moenkopi and Hopi. This includes the following highways... State Route 264 between mile markers 322 and 353. Highway 160 between mile markers 312 and 333. U.S. Highway 89 between mile markers 473 and 502. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
